title: What crosses my mind when I'm playing support and my teammate locks in Vayne.

replies.body:
In such case this crosses my mind:

https://s23.postimg.org/i50tgcp8r/kmpkp.jpg
solution play camille support and hit sick wall condemns.

you have to play tahm its the only way
http://41.media.tumblr.com/e41b539cc33a01554b4eaf46abeca9ea/tumblr_nqmgkj4H8U1shiin5o1_1280.jpg
...ops

i would but they took away all of his damage pressure his ult is super useless and situational and long to activate on a long cooldown 
and i cant speed boost myself with  my minions or deny enemy farm so whats he point. i get it was a joke comment but the pain of the best lore champion of the year and second best game play champion of the year being made so irrevant but they can cry about mages invadeing bot lane (but they were aways there)
more like i am the back line (i main support tanks)
